results.title: Atonement
results.creator_credit: Universal Pictures, Relativity Media, Working Title Films, StudioCanal, Jacqueline Durran, Sarah Greenwood, Joe Wright, Paul Webster, Christopher Hampton, Eric Fellner and Tim Bevan
results.headline_credit: France, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2007
results.brief_description: As a 13-year-old, fledgling writer Briony Tallis irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister’s lover of a crime he did not commit.

constellations_other.name: The war effort on film
constellations_other.description: Newsreel and documentaries were used as propaganda for the war effort by all sides during WWII, many of them made by major film studios, directors and actors.

results.title: Astro Boy
results.brief_description: In the year 2000, Dr. Boyton creates a super-robot in his deceased son’s image. He calls the robot Astro Boy. Astro Boy can swim oceans, leap over mountains, even fly into space on his own power. However, Astro Boy can’t replace his son.

constellations_other.name: 9.5mm Pathe-Baby and parents behaving badly
constellations_other.description: A look at the link between the Path√©-Baby system and animation, as well as the relationship between cinematic parents and their children.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs, influence and inspiration
constellations_other.description: A tradition of influence and inspiration beginning with Eisenstein.

results.description:
In the year 2000, Dr. Boyton creates a super-robot in his deceased son’s image. He calls the robot Astro Boy. Astro Boy can swim oceans, leap over mountains, even fly into space on his own power. However, Astro Boy can’t replace his son. Dr. Boyton becomes dissatisfied with the boy robot and disowns him.

Astro Boy is befriended by Dr. Packadermus J. Elefun of the Institute of Science, who guides him through his adventures. Endowed with super strength, rocket-powered flight, a selfless heart and a kind demeanor, Astro Boy fights a never-ending crusade against the forces of evil!
description_for_label:
In the year 2000, Dr. Boyton creates a super-robot in his deceased son’s image. He calls the robot Astro Boy. Astro Boy can swim oceans, leap over mountains, even fly into space on his own power. However, Astro Boy can’t replace his son. Dr. Boyton becomes dissatisfied with the boy robot and disowns him.

Astro Boy is befriended by Dr. Packadermus J. Elefun of the Institute of Science, who guides him through his adventures. Endowed with super strength, rocket-powered flight, a selfless heart and a kind demeanor, Astro Boy fights a never-ending crusade against the forces of evil!

results.title: Assassins
results.brief_description: In the criminal justice system, where convictions are made based on arguments being convincing beyond a reasonable doubt, editing factual media has the ability to create doubt, shedding new light on closed cases and can even right the wrongs of the justice system.

constellations_primary.name: Assassins: real world manifestations
constellations_primary.description: Ryan White‚Äôs documentary Assassins breaks down the wild true story of the assassination of North Korea‚Äôs Kim John-nam, diving into the political and personal motivations behind the event.

constellations_primary.name: Reasonable doubt
constellations_primary.description: Factual media has the power to reframe information and put forth new, persuasive arguments.  For the criminal justice system, where convictions are made based on arguments being convincing beyond a reasonable doubt, True Crime media has the ability to create doubt, right the wrongs of the justice system, and shed new light on closed cases.

results.description: In 2017, the estranged half-brother of North Korean leader Kim Jong-un was murdered in a crowded Malaysian airport. Poisoned in broad daylight, Kim Jong-nam‚Äôs death captured the world’s attention. It wasn‚Äôt just the victim’s high profile that had news desks in a flurry but the two unassuming young women at the centre of the attack. Wild stories emerged of them being highly trained North Korean spies equipped with poison lipstick while others suggested a bizarre tale of a video prank gone wrong.
description_for_label: In 2017, the estranged half-brother of North Korean leader Kim Jong-un was murdered in a crowded Malaysian airport. Poisoned in broad daylight, Kim Jong-nam‚Äôs death captured the world’s attention. It wasn‚Äôt just the victim’s high profile that had news desks in a flurry but the two unassuming young women at the centre of the attack. Wild stories emerged of them being highly trained North Korean spies equipped with poison lipstick while others suggested a bizarre tale of a video prank gone wrong.

results.title: Assassin's Creed
results.headline_credit: France, Hong Kong, Malta, Taiwan, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2016
results.brief_description: Through unlocked genetic memories that allow him to relive the adventures of his ancestor in 15th century Spain, Callum Lynch discovers he’s a descendant of the secret ‘Assassins’ society. After gaining incredible knowledge and skills, he is now poised to take on the oppressive Knights Templar in the present day.

constellations_other.name: The Australian industry
constellations_other.description: Though our local industry is small, our impact is huge!

constellations_other.name: Alice Babidge and True History of the Kelly Gang
constellations_other.description: An acclaimed set, costume, and production designer in the world of theatre, Alice Babidge has most recently been working in film including Justin Kurzel features Snowtown and True History Of The Kelly Gang.

results.headline_credit_for_label: Belgium, France, Tunisia and United Arab Emirates, 2015
results.description: Tunis, summer 2010, a few months before the Revolution: Farah, 18 years old, has just graduated and her family already sees her as a future doctor. But she doesn’t have the same idea. She sings in a political rock band, has a passion for life, gets drunk, discovers love and her city by night against the wishes of her mother Hayet, who knows Tunisia and its dangers all too well.

results.title: Aquaman
results.headline_credit: Australia and United States of America, 2018
results.brief_description: Once home to the most advanced civilization on Earth, Atlantis is now an underwater kingdom ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a vast army at his disposal, Orm plans to conquer the remaining oceanic people and then the surface world. Standing in his way is Arthur Curry, Orm’s half-human, half-Atlantean brother and true heir to the throne.

constellations_primary.name: Aquaman VFX
constellations_primary.description: As well as becoming a global box-office sensation, Aquaman (2018) featured groundbreaking visual effects from Australian companies such as Method Studios.

constellations_other.name: Australians on the world stage
constellations_other.description: George Miller‚Äôs Mad Max revolutionised movies when it tore through cinemas in 1979. Max Rockatansky‚Äôs journey dispensing justice across the wasteland in his V8 Interceptor became a cult classic and catapulted Australian cinema onto the world stage.

results.description: Once home to the most advanced civilization on Earth, Atlantis is now an underwater kingdom ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. Standing in his way is Arthur Curry, Orm’s half-human, half-Atlantean brother and true heir to the throne.

results.title: Apollo 13
results.brief_description: The true story of technical troubles that scuttle the Apollo 13 lunar mission in 1971, risking the lives of astronaut Jim Lovell and his crew, with the failed journey turning into a thrilling saga of heroism. Drifting more than 200,000 miles from Earth, the astronauts work furiously with the ground crew to avert tragedy.

Drifting more than 200,000 miles from Earth, the astronauts work furiously with the ground crew to avert tragedy.

results.title: Apollo 11
results.brief_description: A look at the Apollo 11 mission to land on the moon led by commander Neil Armstrong and pilot Buzz Aldrin.
results.description: A look at the Apollo 11 mission to land on the moon led by commander Neil Armstrong and pilot Buzz Aldrin.
description_for_label: A look at the Apollo 11 mission to land on the moon led by commander Neil Armstrong and pilot Buzz Aldrin.

results.title: Apocalypse Now
results.brief_description: At the height of the Vietnam war, Captain Benjamin Willard is sent on a dangerous mission that, officially, “does not exist, nor will it ever exist.” His goal is to locate - and eliminate - a mysterious Green Beret Colonel named Walter Kurtz, who has been leading his personal army on illegal guerrilla missions into enemy territory.

constellations_other.name: Hell no, we won't go
constellations_other.description: The cultural, social, psychological and political effects of the Vietnam War have been explored through cinematic classics, musicals and comedies.

results.title: Another Evening with Fred Astaire
results.brief_description: A one-hour live television special starring Fred Astaire.
